unnormalised: ## Oh No, Did Your Cart Do a 'Bhool Bhulaiyaa'? Cart Abandonment Woes and How to Fix 'Em!
normalised: ## Oh No, Did Your Cart Do a 'Bhool Bhulaiyaa'? Cart Abandonment Woes and How to Fix 'Em!

unnormalised: We've all been there, haven't we? Scrolling through Myntra, eyeing that perfect Manish Malhotra-inspired kurta for Diwali, adding it to your cart, and then… *poof*! Vanished. Like Shah Rukh Khan's memory in 'Baadshah'. Cart abandonment, folks, it's the silent killer of e-commerce dreams.

unnormalised: So, how do you win back those wandering carts? Retargeting ads are like your friend persistently reminding you about that discounted jalebi you almost bought. Abandoned cart emails offering a sweet discount (say, 10% off?) can work wonders. Make the checkout process smooth as butter chicken, and those carts will be rolling right into your bank account. Now go forth and conquer, mere doston! And don't let your website become a 'Bhool Bhulaiyaa' of abandoned carts!
